ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl

Class AbstractGlslProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, GpuShaderProgram
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlslRenderingProgram, GlslSkeletalRenderingProgram, GlslSkyBoxProgram, GlslTessProgram

    abstract class AbstractGlslProgram
extends java.lang.Object
implements GpuShaderProgram
    Base implementation of the shader-program interface.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

      • bind

        public void bind()
        Description copied from interface: GpuShaderProgram
        Binds this program to make it active.

        The next renderable to be submitted to the pipeline will be processed by this instance. This step must be executed before fetching data.

        Specified by:
        bind in interface GpuShaderProgram

      • fetch

        public void fetch(GpuShaderProgram.Context ctx)
        Description copied from interface: GpuShaderProgram
        Gets data from the context and submits it into the pipeline, in preparation for a command to draw the renderable.

        This step must be executed after binding data.

        Specified by:
        fetch in interface GpuShaderProgram
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context.

        public void unbind()

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
        notifyDispose in interface Disposable
